Rates

XP/SP Rate: x20
Adena Rate: x10

Quest Drop Rate: 2x
Enchant Safe/Max Value: +4/+16
Normal Scroll Chance: 60%
Blessed Scroll Chance: 65%
Attributes St. Rate Chance: 40%
Attributes Cr. Rate Chance: 30%

Buff Time Value: 2 hours
Max. Clients per PC Value: 6
Olympiad:
Heroes are chosen every 2 weeks, at 15th of each month and at 1st. HWID Protection and antifeed system helping you for fair matches, without 3v3 and class based matches. Starting points are 50, and every week you gain 25. Max enchant on olympiad even if your items are enchanted over +6, in olympiad they counted as +6!
